location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to the Accountant Military Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, transmits muster rolls, bills of supplies, abstracts and the account current for military disbursements at the Residency during the months of January, February and March 1824. Transmissions not included.
